humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma as 1.9 cm. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma in the right breast measures 1.9 cm (T1c) and there is no information suggesting that the tumor has extended beyond the breast or into the chest wall or skin, which would be required for a T2, T3, or T4 classification.
